Desc.entry: Family martial arts with kickboxing and self defence classes for ages 5 years and over, mixed junior and adult classes. Learn the martial art American kickboxing and basic self defence techniques eg group attacks and weapon attacks. Great for weight loss, toning, flexibility, confidence, stress relief and discipline for junior members. Also organise social events outside the class such as cinema, ten pin bowling etc. New students will be classed as unfit for health and safety reasons.

category.entry: MARTIAL ARTS - COMBINATION, KICK BOXING AND THAI BOXING
